select tc.course_name courseName, tc.course_no courseNo, cd.course_time courseTime, sc.course_date_before_delay courseDateBeforeDelay, sc.course_date_after_delay courseDateAfterDelay, cd.start_date startDateAfterDelay, cd.end_date_after_delay endDateAfterDelay, cd.id, cd.error_message errorMessage, cd.syn_error_message synErrorMessage, tmtc.course_name mtCourseName, tmtc.type type
from tab_delay_course_detail cd join tab_delay_schedulling_change sc on sc.delay_course_detail_id = cd.id and sc.course_time = cd.course_time left join t_course tc on tc.id = cd.course_id left join t_more_teacher_course tmtc on tmtc.id = cd.mt_course_id where cd.delay_course_record_id=#{delayCourseRecordId}
